From Pierre-Yves Berrard, ASCII art 

```{r}
input |>
  head(100) |> 
  str_sub(end = 100L) |> 
  stringr::str_replace_all(
    c("-" = "\u2500",
      "\\|" = "\u2502",
      "F" = "\u250C",
      "J" = "\u2518",
      "7" = "\u2510",
      "L" = "\u2514",
      "S" = "o")
  ) |>
  cat(sep = "\n") |> 
  write_lines("11_ascii.txt")
```
